paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the BRCA2 c.7977-1G>C variant, including clinical significance, penetrance data, and individual records.

functional_data.summary: BRCA2 c.7977-1G>C was shown to increase the expression of two naturally occurring transcripts that contain frameshifts.

variants.additional_notes: The variant is associated with disease and should be managed clinically like classical truncating mutations.
key_quotes: The Bayes scores from five informative families with BRCA2 c.7977-1G>C was 47401:1.
Multifactorial likelihood analysis indicates that the BRCA2 c.7977-1G>C variant is a disease-associated mutation.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data for the BRCA2 variant was extracted from the main text.
